[Motivational interviewing (see item 1) is an essential tool in addictology.

properties.question: What is the primary purpose of using motivational interviewing in addictology?
properties.option_a: To prescribe medication for addiction treatment
properties.option_b: To provide a structured environment for addicts to follow strict rules
properties.option_c: To enhance the patient's motivation to change their behavior related to substance use
properties.option_d: To offer legal advice to individuals struggling with substance abuse
